alert.note: Alert for Clark; Delaware; Franklin; Madison; Pickaway; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 1:14PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...FRANKLIN...NORTHERN FAYETTE...NORTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND SOUTHERN DELAWARE COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO... SOUTHEASTERN CLARK AND CENTRAL GREENE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...SOUTHEASTERN UNION AND MADISON COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 145 PM EST... At 113 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Marysville to near Choctaw Lake to Cedarville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Beavercreek, Dublin, Westerville, Grove City, Delaware, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Fairborn, Hilliard, Xenia, Marysville, Worthington, Bexley, London, Yellow Springs, Jefferson, Powell, Sunbury, and Plain City. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 68 and 103. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 62 and 129. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Delaware; Franklin; Madison; Pickaway; Union
